title: ISic002926. I.Sicily inscription 002926
body:

Pauli[nus re-]
ceptụ[s ---]

Apparatus criticus

Text after Manganaro 1993 (which is after Bernabò Brea 1947) with slight changes based on Manganaro's apograph

translation

commentary
